responsibilities: Working on the main product of the company catering the Health Insurance market of the USA using MERN stack.

Made a marketing website from scratch using React and integrated Google Analytics with it.
Actively participated in collaborative team discussions, code reviews and problem solving.
Helped new joinees understand the code convention and practices and helped them whenever they need.
